full_text: UNLV Athletics is hosting a Bed Build Day on April 30 in Thomas & Mack parking lot and public is invited to help. The department has partnered with Sleep In Heavenly Peace to build 100 beds to help Las Vegas youth that are in need of a comfortable place to sleep.
